title: FontPool: Bold, Condensed, and wet all over
content: I guess [this Unzipped post](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907172005/http:/www.fontshop.be/details.php?entry=309) **has** to be shared! [http://www.fontshop.be/details.php?entry=309](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907172005/http:/www.fontshop.be/details.php?entry=309 "http://www.fontshop.be/details.php?entry=309") … the Belgian/Dutch FontShop franchise that is spearheading cutting-edge typographic research. We are proud to present to you revolutionary innovations in inflatable, wet, adhesive and edible type, and invite you to discover… FontPool. [ ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907172005im_/http:/typophile.com/files/A6ZRW4UJ_4055.jpg) ](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907172005/http:/www.fontshop.be/details.php?entry=309) The FontPool concept has been thoroughly tested according to the most demanding scientific requisites – through empirical research which produced measurable and repeatable results. Both female and male test subjects were used, ranging from one to eleven years old – a representative cross section of the juvenile population. What follows is a photographic – dare we add ‘historic’? – document of FontPool. Enjoy! [ ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907172005im_/http:/typophile.com/files/JVHRE0I3_5635.jpg) ](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907172005/http:/www.fontshop.be/details.php?entry=309) [ ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907172005im_/http:/typophile.com/files/LJTG7YVB_5831.jpg) ](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907172005/http:/www.fontshop.be/details.php?entry=309) A lot more splashy pics on Unzipped: [http://www.fontshop.be/details.php?entry=309](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907172005/http:/www.fontshop.be/details.php?entry=309 "http://www.fontshop.be/details.php?entry=309") [‹ Trajan but a little more unique!](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907172005/http:/typophile.com/node/47501 "Go to previous forum topic") [Help on dissertation, Legibility versus readability ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907172005/http:/typophile.com/node/8049 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Florian Hardwig

comments.content: And it gets even better — as of today FontPool officially is [a contest with which you can win one of ten FontBooks](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907172005/http:/www.fontshop.be/details.php?entry=310). Check the rules later this afternoon/evening.
Did these contest rules ever appear?
Sorry, the contest is only open to Benelux residents. :^(

Oh really? Doesn’t say so anywhere on Unzipped, does it?

No holidays for me anyway.

Yves, where are you? I think the Quizes need to be updated/refreshed.  
And – I’m missing the (x)es and your comments here and there.

The rules were added a little later because we had to decide if we’d limit the contest to the Benelux or not. We _are_ giving away ten FontBooks after all.

As for my apparent absence — I’m in a major transition period. Thing’s will improve after the switch on August 1st. ;^)
